name: Distortion Games Inc.
description:
You're an employee of the struggling indie game studio - Distortion Games. But disaster has struck - you've sent your boss an email meant for someone else - and you weren't exactly writing the most "work friendly" message. Oh, and you're all robots.

Just walk down the hall to your boss's office and delete the email. He's not even here, so it's an easy run. Oh well Jerry the axolotl bot is here...  was the office always this dark? Jerry? Jerry?!
